sub_topic: The construction of the Hilbert curve.
message_1:
What is the total length of the Hilbert curve of order 4?

Hint: The formula for the length of the Hilbert curve of order n is L(n) = 2^(2n-1) - 1.
message_2:
Using the formula L(n) = 2^(2n-1) - 1, we can find the total length of the Hilbert curve of order 4:

L(4) = 2^(2*4 - 1) - 1
L(4) = 2^(8 - 1) - 1
L(4) = 2^7 - 1
L(4) = 128 - 1
L(4) = 127

The total length of the Hilbert curve of order 4 is 127.
